name: Very cute cafe
description:
Are you ready to become a famous chef and manage a network of restaurants?
Your vocation is to prepare a variety of dishes and drinks. Open a burger, a pizzeria, or maybe ... a pastry shop? A bit of practice, and now a crowd of satisfied customers agree to stand in a huge queue for the opportunity to try your cooking masterpieces !!! Burgers, coffee, smoothies, cakes, pizza, ice cream and much more - you have something to feed the hungry visitors!
Improve your restaurant: new equipment, top quality products, a new interior - this will increase your income and will please visitors. And when you become cramped in one cafe, you can open a new and complete change the menu!
Cooking is an exciting process, but be careful: the chef should prepare the food according to the recipe, otherwise the visitors are very upset! Feeding all is not an easy task.
"Very cute cafe" - an exciting cooking game that will entertain you and train correctly to prioritize. And hurry up ... hungry visitors quickly lose patience!

Features:
• Many levels with their own unique ingredients;
• A variety of kitchen appliances and dishes that can be improved;
• Interesting options for the interior cafe;
• A well thought-out system of achievements and bonuses;
• Unexpected helpers and not only.

Your new cafe is ready for opening!
